vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συζωοποιέω,
quicken together with, τινὰς τῷ Χριστῷ [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to make alive with (someone)
to make alive together with another; to make a sharer in the quickening of another, Eph. 2:5; Col. 2:13*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: resucitar con ; dar vida juntamente con
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 與某人一起使活過來 (弗 2:5; 西 3:13|)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 与某人一起使活过来 (弗 2:5; 西 3:13|)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: làm sống với nhau. σύν (G4862) + ζῳοποιέω (G2227)
